document.full_text: the chance of record red river flooding at fargo, north dakota this spring has grown to nearly 50 percent and forecasts of how high the water will crest have increased all along the river, the national weather service said on friday.
document.title: nearly 50 percent chance of record fargo flood
lines_and_colors: the chance of record red river flooding at fargo, north dakota this spring has grown to nearly 50 percent and forecasts of how high the water will crest have increased all along the river, the national weather service said on friday.
